DOC.brief_summary: Chronic musculoskeletal pain important problem , treatment often prescribe `` trial error '' fashion . Clinicians prescribe treatment patient wait see treatment successful . If treatment unsuccessful , try different treatment . The disadvantage method may take long time find successful treatment . The purpose PREEMPT Study test whether use mobile phone application ( `` Trialist app '' ) allow patient health care provider run personalize experiment compare two pain treatment effective usual care . Patients download app , work clinician , set personalized trial make sense . Every day answer question track level pain side effect treatment , fatigue constipation . Once personalized trial end , response daily question treatment compare . During regular clinic visit , patient clinician review visual display result facilitate treatment decision-making . Approximately 250 patient enrol study . Half patient use app review result clinician , half patient continue regular care ( i.e. , use app ) . The two group compare see use app successful improve long term pain outcome . The goal intervention use Trialist app help patient engage actively collaboratively clinician identify effective treatment quickly .
